languages.text: "Мои братья, трудящиеся над вратами, более сведущи в творении из призрачной кости... но даже они не в силах постичь все тонкости того, чтобы было создано миропевцем — священным хранителем Лилэтан, имевшим особую связь с Мировым духом. Его дух ныне покоится среди собратьев — а мы, словно слепцы, тыкаемся в хитросплетения врат и бьемся над тайной их молчания".

traits.locale_text: "Мои братья, трудящиеся над вратами, более сведущи в творении из психокости... но даже они не в силах постичь все тонкости того, чтобы было создано миропевцем — священным хранителем Лилэтан, имевшим особую связь с Мировым духом. Его дух ныне покоится среди собратьев — а мы, словно слепцы, тыкаемся в хитросплетения врат и бьемся над тайной их молчания".

languages.text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."
languages.original_text: "Мои братья, трудящиеся над вратами, более сведущи в творении из призрачной кости... но даже они не в силах постичь все тонкости того, чтобы было создано миропевцем — священным хранителем Лилэтан, имевшим особую связь с Мировым духом. Его дух ныне покоится среди собратьев — а мы, словно слепцы, тыкаемся в хитросплетения врат и бьемся над тайной их молчания".

traits.locale_text: "My brethren who are toiling on the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the world spirit. Their own spirit now rests among their brethren — and we, blind in our insight, are bumping into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

Their own spirit now rests among their brethren — and we, blind in our insight, are bumping into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

languages.text: “我的族人们正在门前劳作，他们比我更精通灵骨的艺术……但即便是他们，也无法理解咏世者设计的每个细节。咏世者是莉莱赞的秘密守护者，他们与世界之魂有着非同寻常的联结。咏世者的精神如今得到了安息，但我们依然在黑暗中探索。我们无法理解大门的精妙设计，它沉默不语的奥妙困扰着我们。”
languages.original_text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

traits.locale_text: “我的族人们正在门前劳作，他们比我更精通灵骨的艺术……但即便是他们，也无法理解咏世者设计的每个细节。咏世者是莉莱赞的秘密守护者，他们与世界之魂有着非同寻常的联结。咏世者的精神如今得到了安息，但我们依然在黑暗中探索。我们无法理解大门的精妙设计，它沉默不语的奥妙困扰着我们。”

languages.text: «Los miembros de mi pueblo que trabajan con la puerta saben más sobre el arte de las creaciones de hueso espectral... pero ni siquiera ellos pueden comprender los detalles ideados por el cantor de mundos. Es el guardián sagrado del Lilaethan, que compartía un vínculo singular con el espíritu del mundo. Su espíritu descansa ahora con los demás, mientras que nosotros, dando palos de ciego, nos enredamos en la complejidad de la puerta sin alcanzar a comprender el misterio de su silencio».
languages.original_text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

traits.locale_text: «Los miembros de mi pueblo que trabajan con la puerta saben más sobre el arte de las creaciones de hueso espectral... pero ni siquiera ellos pueden comprender los detalles ideados por el cantor de mundos. Es el guardián sagrado del Lilaethan, que compartía un vínculo singular con el espíritu del mundo. Su espíritu descansa ahora con los demás, mientras que nosotros, dando palos de ciego, nos enredamos en la complejidad de la puerta sin alcanzar a comprender el misterio de su silencio».

languages.text: 「門の向こうで働く同胞は幽骨の創造技術に長けている…しかし、彼らでさえ詳細をすべて理解できないものがある。ワールドシンガーが設計したものだ。リラエタンの聖なる番人にして、世界の魂と希有な絆で結ばれた者の手で。ワールドシンガーの魂は同胞の中に眠っている。かたや我らは、目を閉ざしたまま複雑に絡まった門へと不覚にも入りこみ、どうして音がしないのかと途方に暮れている」
languages.original_text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

traits.locale_text: 「門の向こうで働く同胞は幽骨の創造技術に長けている…しかし、彼らでさえ詳細をすべて理解できないものがある。ワールドシンガーが設計したものだ。リラエタンの聖なる番人にして、世界の魂と希有な絆で結ばれた者の手で。ワールドシンガーの魂は同胞の中に眠っている。かたや我らは、目を閉ざしたまま複雑に絡まった門へと不覚にも入りこみ、どうして音がしないのかと途方に暮れている」

languages.text: "Die Meinen, die jetzt an dem Tor arbeiten, sind sehr vertraut mit der Kunst der Phantomkristall-Schöpfungen ... aber selbst sie können nicht jedes Detail durchschauen, das der Weltensänger ersonnen hat – der heilige Hüter der Lileath, den ein seltenes Band mit dem Weltenbewusstsein verknüpfte. Sein Geist ruht jetzt bei den Seinen – während wir blind in das komplexe Geflecht des Tors vorstoßen, ratlos angesichts der Geheimnisse seines Schweigens."
languages.original_text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

traits.locale_text: "Die Meinen, die jetzt an dem Tor arbeiten, sind sehr vertraut mit der Kunst der Phantomkristall-Schöpfungen ... aber selbst sie können nicht jedes Detail durchschauen, das der Weltensänger ersonnen hat – der heilige Hüter der Lileath, den ein seltenes Band mit dem Weltenbewusstsein verknüpfte. Sein Geist ruht jetzt bei den Seinen – während wir blind in das komplexe Geflecht des Tors vorstoßen, ratlos angesichts der Geheimnisse seines Schweigens."

languages.text: « Ceux de mes congénères qui l'étudient sont des spécialistes des créations de moelle spectrale... et pourtant, beaucoup d'aspects de la création du Chante-monde, gardien sacré de la lilaethan qui partageait un lien puissant avec l'esprit-monde, leur échappent complètement. Nous poursuivons donc à l'aveugle nos recherches sur un portail dont la complexité et le silence restent un mystère complet. »
languages.original_text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux de mes congénères qui l'étudient sont des spécialistes des créations de moelle spectrale... et pourtant, beaucoup d'aspects de la création du Chante-monde, gardien sacré de la lilaethan qui partageait un lien puissant avec l'esprit-monde, leur échappent complètement. Nous poursuivons donc à l'aveugle nos recherches sur un portail dont la complexité et le silence restent un mystère complet. »

languages.text: "Geçit üzerinde çalışan soydaşlarım, tayfkemiği sanatında büyük irfan sahibidir. Fakat onlar bile, Lilaethan'ın Dünya Ruhu'yla eşsiz bir bağa sahip kutsal muhafızı olan Dünya Ezgicisi'nin tasarımlarının tüm ayrıntılarına hâkim değiller. Ruhu artık soydaşlarıyla birlikte uyuyor. Biz ise sınırlı kavrayış kapasitemizle geçidin karmakarışık girinti çıkıntılarını anlamaya çalışıyor, sessizliğinin gizemiyle kör topal ilerliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "My kin labouring over the gate are better versed in the art of wraithbone creations... but even they cannot fathom every detail designed by the Worldsinger — the sacred keeper of the Lilaethan, who shared a rare bond with the World Spirit. Their spirit now rests among their kin — whilst we, blind in our insight, blunder into the intricate tangle of the gate, stumped by the mystery of its silence."
